channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Big Walk, Little Walk. Pepi Nana is big and Little Nana is small. When the two friends go for a walk together, they discover how they see things differently - and how much fun that can be.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Crash Bang Chicken. Stop-motion animation. A Skymoo accidentally knocks the Iron Chicken out of her nest, and in falling to the surface of the Clangers' planet she hurts her wing.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Windy Day in the Garden. Series for young children. On a very windy day, Igglepiggle's blanket is blown into the air and the Tombliboos' trousers are blown off the line.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: 21/10/2025. A different story read each night just before bedtime.
